title: The True Value of Macro Forecasting - Ep 13
itunes:title: The True Value of Macro Forecasting - Ep 13
description:
Market forecasting is like weather forecasting: It has a short shelf life and is therefore of little use. But there is a place for macro forecasting in investing. Listen to Vitaliy explain what that place is.

You can read this article online at: https://contrarianedge.com/the-true-value-of-macro-forecasting/
